adjust_slider.doc_string: Adjusts the slider for the 'Onion skin' style image diff.

args.name: forward
args.doc_string: Whether to move the slider in the forward direction.

args.name: jump_to_end
args.doc_string: Whether to jump to the end of the slider without stepping through the slider in an incremental/decremental manner.

add_submodule.doc_string: Adds the given repository as a submodule to the current repository.

args.name: repository_path
args.doc_string: The URL to the repository or an absolute/relative path.
